title: Bound To The Billionaire
description: Taboo Gay BDSM Billionaire Forbidden Erotic Romance  Inexperienced, attractive, young David has never been used to the spotlight, but now he's about to get center stage...  A lucky break at the local newspaper thrusts him into the world of news reporting. After a rather humiliating night at the National Press Awards, David catches the eye of the most enigmatic - and hottest - media tycoon in the world: Redmond Cooper. Not only is Mr. Cooper ultra hot, but he's also a billionaire!  Soon, David is exploring sides of himself that he never knew existed. And Mr. Cooper is going to guide him through it every step of the way...  This is a 53,000 word erotic gay billionaire romance novel. It tells the story of a truly dominant alpha male and a passionate young man. Contains explicit scenes of tying up, spanking and BDSM.
author: Rod Sharpe
